meanings.definition: A meeting in which participants communicate through audio and video technology.
meanings.sent1: During the teleconference, everyone could see and hear each other through their screens.
meanings.sent2: We had a teleconference with our colleagues from different offices to discuss the project.
meanings.sent3: The teleconference was like having a virtual gathering with all our team members.
meanings.sent4: In the teleconference, it felt as if we were all in the same room, despite being miles apart.
meanings.sent5: The teleconference made it easy for us to connect and share ideas without being physically present.

meanings.definition: To participate in a meeting through audio and video technology.
meanings.sent1: She teleconferenced with her clients to finalize the details of the contract.
meanings.sent2: We will teleconference with the international team to coordinate the project timelines.
meanings.sent3: He teleconferenced with his friends to plan a surprise birthday party for their colleague.
meanings.sent4: Teleconferencing allowed us to have productive meetings without the need for travel.
meanings.sent5: They teleconference regularly to stay connected and work on their group project together.
